text: After April 2, 1938, neither the Chief Clerk nor the Chief Inspector of the Department of Human Services of the District of Columbia shall act as a deputy to the Director of the Department of Human Services of said District.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 6-107.

1973 Ed., § 6-108.

Miscellaneous Notes

Office of Director of Public Health abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-101.

DC CODE § 7-171

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Chief Clerk and Chief Inspector not to act as deputy.
